post.description: Place order to the futures trading system, you can place two major types of orders: limit and market. Orders can only be placed if your account has sufficient funds. Once an order is placed, your funds will be put on hold for the duration of the order. The amount of funds on hold depends on the order type and parameters specified.

orderId.description: The unique order id generated by the trading system,which can be used later for further actions such as canceling the order.

post.x-sdk-method-description: Place order to the futures trading system, you can place two major types of orders: limit and market. Orders can only be placed if your account has sufficient funds. Once an order is placed, your funds will be put on hold for the duration of the order. The amount of funds on hold depends on the order type and parameters specified.

clientOid.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, the maximum length cannot exceed 40, e.g. UUID, Only allows numbers, characters, underline(_), and separator(-)

side.description: specify if the order is to 'buy' or 'sell'

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

leverage.description: Used to calculate the margin to be frozen for the order. If you are to close the position, this parameter is not required.

type.description: specify if the order is an 'limit' order or 'market' order

stop.description: Either 'down' or 'up'.  If stop is used,parameter stopPrice and stopPriceType also need to be provieded.

x-api-enum.name: down
x-api-enum.description: Triggers when the price reaches or goes below the stopPrice.

x-api-enum.name: up
x-api-enum.description: Triggers when the price reaches or goes above the stopPrice

stopPriceType.description: Either 'TP' or 'MP', Need to be defined if stop is specified.

x-api-enum.name: trade price
x-api-enum.description: TP for trade price, The last trade price is the last price at which an order was filled. This price can be found in the latest match message.

x-api-enum.name: mark price
x-api-enum.description: MP for mark price, The mark price can be obtained through relevant OPEN API for index services

stopPrice.description: Need to be defined if stop is specified.

reduceOnly.description: A mark to reduce the position size only. Set to false by default. Need to set the position size when reduceOnly is true. If set to true, only the orders reducing the position size will be executed. If the reduce-only order size exceeds the position size, the extra size will be canceled.

closeOrder.description: A mark to close the position. Set to false by default. If closeOrder is set to true, the system will close the position and the position size will become 0. Side, Size and Leverage fields can be left empty and the system will determine the side and size automatically.

x-api-enum.name: ISOLATED
x-api-enum.description: Isolated Margin

price.description: Required for type is 'limit' order, indicating the operating price

size.description: Order size (Lot), must be a positive integer. The quantity unit of coin-swap contracts is size(lot), and other units are not supported.

timeInForce.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, [Time in force](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338146) is a special strategy used during trading, default is GTC

x-api-enum.name: Good Till Canceled
x-api-enum.description: order remains open on the order book until canceled. This is the default type if the field is left empty.

x-api-enum.name: Immediate Or Cancel
x-api-enum.description: being matched or not, the remaining size of the order will be instantly canceled instead of entering the order book.

postOnly.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order,  post only flag, invalid when timeInForce is IOC. When postOnly is true, not allowed choose hidden or iceberg. The post-only flag ensures that the trader always pays the maker fee and provides liquidity to the order book. If any part of the order is going to pay taker fee, the order will be fully rejected.

hidden.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, orders not displaying in order book. When hidden chose, not allowed choose postOnly.

iceberg.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, Only visible portion of the order is displayed in the order book. When iceberg chose, not allowed choose postOnly.

visibleSize.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, The maximum visible size of an iceberg order. please place order in size (lots), The units of qty (base currency) and valueQty (value) are not supported. Need to be defined if iceberg is specified.

cancelledOrderIds.description: The orderId that is to be canceled

post.summary: Add Take Profit And Stop Loss Order
post.description: Place take profit and stop loss order supports both take-profit and stop-loss functions, and other functions are exactly the same as the place order interface.

orderId.description: The unique order ID generated by the trading system, which can be used later for further actions such as canceling the order.

post.x-sdk-method-description: Place take profit and stop loss order supports both take-profit and stop-loss functions, and other functions are exactly the same as the place order interface.

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract. Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

leverage.description: Used to calculate the margin to be frozen for the order. If you are to close the position, this parameter is not required.

type.description: Specify if the order is a 'limit' order or 'market' order

reduceOnly.description: A mark to reduce the position size only. Set to false by default. Need to set the position size when reduceOnly is true. If set to true, only the orders reducing the position size will be executed. If the reduce-only order size exceeds the position size, the extra size will be canceled.

closeOrder.description: A mark to close the position. Set to false by default. If closeOrder is set to true, the system will close the position and the position size will become 0. Side, Size and Leverage fields can be left empty and the system will determine the side and size automatically.

price.description: Required for type is 'limit' order, indicating the operating price

size.description: Order size (lot), must be a positive integer. The quantity unit of coin-swap contracts is size (lot), and other units are not supported.

postOnly.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, post only flag, invalid when timeInForce is IOC. When postOnly is true, choosing hidden or iceberg is not allowed. The post-only flag ensures that the trader always pays the maker fee and provides liquidity to the order book. If any part of the order is going to pay taker fees, the order will be fully rejected.

hidden.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, orders not displaying in order book. When hidden is chosen, choosing postOnly is not allowed.

iceberg.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, Only visible portion of the order is displayed in the order book. When iceberg is chosen, choosing postOnly is not allowed.

visibleSize.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, the maximum visible size of an iceberg order. Please place order in size (lots). The units of qty (base currency) and valueQty (value) are not supported. Need to be defined if iceberg is specified.

post.description: This interface can be used to obtain information about risk limit level of a specific contract (only valid for Isolated Margin).

data.description: Adjusting the level will result in the cancellation of any open orders. The response will indicate only whether the adjustment request was successfully submitted.

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract. Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

post.description: This endpoint is only applicable to isolated margin and is no longer recommended. It is recommended to use cross margin instead.
